titleStmt.title: A proclamation, against the resset of the rebels, and for delivering them up to justice
Proclamations. 1679-06-26
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty, anno Dom. 1679. Reprinted for Andrew Forrester, in King-street VVestminster,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the twentieth sixth day of June, 1679. and of our reign the thirty one year.
Arms 254; Steele notation: Faith, their un-.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
